nodes.text: On one occasion after experiencing her period, Queen Padmé Amidala spent several hours in bed waiting for painkillers to kick in.

Pain-relieving gas, a type of painkiller, was issed to Imperial medics and used on the Expansion Region planet of Mimban during the Mimban campaign to treat a concussion injury suffered by Corporal Chakobi Sanwright in 10 BBY.
